system.description:
Trained cavaliers clad in steel armor, plumed with beautiful rainbow feathers, and engraved with geometric incantations.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Crescent Slash. Attack all enemies in an area (path 3) then taunt all hit until the end of the Knight's next riff.

Gambits [[/r d4]]

1: Rush > Inflict Violence > Rush

2: Rush > Inflict Violence > Shield Whorl [1]: Remove any number of Block to inflict that many Hits on all adjacent enemies.

3: Rush > Protection [1]: Gain Block 1 > Inflict Violence

4: Rush > Lunar Charge [2]: Move your Speed in a straight line, through enemies. Inflict 1 Hit on all enemies moved through, once per enemy. Gain Block +1 per enemy hit.

traits.name: Conviction
traits.description: All Folk have a reason for fighting, and if reasoned to, can cause them to rethink combat. However, they will fight for their Conviction until it looks like all is bleak.

traits.name: Morale
traits.description: At the beginning of any Resound where there are twice as many Kadungganan than there are enemies (eg., If there are 4 Kadungganan and 2 Enemies left) all Folk enemies will Surrender, becoming Defeated.

traits.name: Divine Striving
traits.description: Whenever a fighter falls to 0 HP, all Akayu fighters gain Striving until the end of their next riff. Their attacks gain Overwhelming and they have +1 to all Prowesses. When they lose Striving, they heal 2.

traits.name: Ironclad
traits.description: When the Knight gains Striving, gain Block 2. While Striving, the Knight cannot be forcibly moved.
